title: Deconstructed
summary: E-waste is piling up and we can't effectively process it at scale. This project looked to reuse and recycle e-waste using advanced robotics. Using a novel image generation pipeline, the system was able to accurately identify and locate screws in a games console, even when heavily occluded by the casing.

title: Fruitful Spaces
tagLine: Hydroponic vegetables grown in underused office space
summary: Employees are demanding more from their office spaces while being there less. Fruitful spaces aims to bring a stronger sense of community while tackling food mileage by growing food and herbs in underutilised office spaces. This IoT enabled hydroponic system produces anything from herbs to full tomatoes to spicy chillis.

featuredImage.alt: A small plant in a Fruitful Unit

title: 3D Facial Reconstruction
tagLine: Digitising faces using an iPhone camera
summary: At Polymetrix, I'm working towards a system to capture highly accurate 3D scans of individuals faces using the iPhone's TrueDepth camera. With 0.5mm precision required, minimal libraries and limited compute resources, how can we convert depth images into 3D models that can be used to fit custom masks?

title: Portfolio Website
summary: While it's a little recursive, I built the website you're on from the ground up using SvelteKit; a modern web framework. This (I hope) is proof that I'm not just a talented engineer, but also one who takes the time to communicate deep technical decisions effectively. What good is a great solution if no-one understands what you were trying to do in the first place?
